description: Detects suspicious process command line that starts with a shell that executes something and finally gets piped into another shell
false_positives: Legitimate software that uses these patterns
name: Linux Shell Pipe to Shell
query: (process.command_line.text:(sh\ \-c\ * OR bash\ \-c\ *) AND (process.command_line.text:(*|\ bash\ * OR *|\ sh\ * OR *|bash\ * OR *|sh\ *) OR process.command_line.text:(*|\ bash OR *|\ sh OR *|bash OR *\ |sh)))
author: Florian Roth
